verses.verse: And when <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it <S%H5869%H2895>pleased<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, he <S%H1980>went<s%> not, as at other <S%H6471>times<s%>, to <S%H7125>seek<s%> for <S%H5173>enchantments<s%>, but he <S%H7896>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7931>abiding<s%> in his tents according to their <S%H7626>tribes<s%>; and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came upon him.

And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> hath <S%H5002>said<s%>, and the <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H8365>open<s%> hath <S%H5002>said<s%>:

He hath <S%H5002>said<s%>, which <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>, which <S%H2372>saw<s%> the <S%H4236>vision<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, <S%H5307>falling<s%> into a trance, but having his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H1540>open<s%>:
How <S%H2895>goodly<s%> are thy <S%H168>tents<s%>, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and thy <S%H4908>tabernacles<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>!

As the <S%H5158>valleys<s%> are they spread <S%H5186>forth<s%>, as <S%H1593>gardens<s%> by the river's <S%H5104>side<s%>, as the trees of lign <S%H174>aloes<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5193>planted<s%>, and as cedar <S%H730>trees<s%> beside the <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

He shall <S%H5140>pour<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5140>out<s%> of his <S%H1805>buckets<s%>, and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be in <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and his <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be <S%H7311>higher<s%> than <S%H90>Agag<s%>, and his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H5375>exalted<s%>.

<S%H410>God<s%> brought him <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; he hath as it were the <S%H8443>strength<s%> of an <S%H7214>unicorn<s%>: he shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> his <S%H6862>enemies<s%>, and shall <S%H1633>break<s%> their <S%H6106>bones<s%>, and <S%H4272>pierce<s%> them through with his <S%H2671>arrows<s%>.

He <S%H3766>couched<s%>, he lay <S%H7901>down<s%> as a <S%H738>lion<s%>, and as a great <S%H3833>lion<s%>: who shall stir him <S%H6965>up<s%>? <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%H1288>blesseth<s%> thee, and <S%H779>cursed<s%> is he that <S%H779>curseth<s%> thee.

¶ And <S%H1111>Balak's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, and he <S%H5606>smote<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5606>together<s%>: and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, I <S%H7121>called<s%> thee to <S%H6895>curse<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and, behold, thou hast <S%H1288>altogether<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>.

Therefore now <S%H1272>flee<s%> thou to thy <S%H4725>place<s%>: I <S%H559>thought<s%> to <S%H3513>promote<s%> thee unto <S%H3513>great<s%> <S%H3513>honour<s%>; but, lo, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath kept thee <S%H4513>back<s%> from <S%H3519>honour<s%>.
And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1111>Balak<s%>, <S%H1696>Spake<s%> I not also to thy <S%H4397>messengers<s%> which thou <S%H7971>sentest<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

If <S%H1111>Balak<s%> would <S%H5414>give<s%> me his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> go <S%H5674>beyond<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad<s%> of mine own <S%H3820>mind<s%>; but what the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>saith<s%>, that will I <S%H1696>speak<s%>?

And now, behold, I <S%H1980>go<s%> unto my <S%H5971>people<s%>: <S%H3212>come<s%> therefore, and I will <S%H3289>advertise<s%> thee what this <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to thy <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

¶ And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> hath <S%H5002>said<s%>, and the <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H8365>open<s%> hath <S%H5002>said<s%>:

He hath <S%H5002>said<s%>, which <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>, and <S%H3045>knew<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the most <S%H5945>High<s%>, which <S%H2372>saw<s%> the <S%H4236>vision<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, <S%H5307>falling<s%> into a trance, but having his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H1540>open<s%>:

I shall <S%H7200>see<s%> him, but not now: I shall <S%H7789>behold<s%> him, but not <S%H7138>nigh<s%>: there shall <S%H1869>come<s%> a <S%H3556>Star<s%> out of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and a <S%H7626>Sceptre<s%> shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> out of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and shall <S%H4272>smite<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and <S%H6979>destroy<s%> all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8352%H8351>Sheth<s%>.

And <S%H123>Edom<s%> shall be a <S%H3424>possession<s%>, <S%H8165>Seir<s%> also shall be a <S%H3424>possession<s%> for his <S%H341>enemies<s%>; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly<s%>.
Out of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall come he that shall have <S%H7287>dominion<s%>, and shall <S%H6>destroy<s%> him that <S%H8300>remaineth<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

¶ And when he <S%H7200>looked<s%> on <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>, he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> was the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; but his <S%H319>latter<s%> end shall be that he <S%H8>perish<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

And he <S%H7200>looked<s%> on the <S%H7017>Kenites<s%>, and took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H386>Strong<s%> is thy <S%H4186>dwellingplace<s%>, and thou <S%H7760>puttest<s%> thy <S%H7064>nest<s%> in a <S%H5553>rock<s%>.
Nevertheless the <S%H7014>Kenite<s%> <S%H518>shall<s%> be <S%H1197>wasted<s%>, until <S%H804>Asshur<s%> shall carry thee away <S%H7617>captive<s%>.
And he took <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H188>Alas<s%>, who shall <S%H2421>live<s%> when <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7760>doeth<s%> this!

And <S%H6716>ships<s%> shall come from the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of <S%H3794>Chittim<s%>, and shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H804>Asshur<s%>, and shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H5677>Eber<s%>, and he also shall <S%H8>perish<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H4725>place<s%>: and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> also <S%H1980>went<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>.
